ProjectTitle: Intelligent Prognosis of Rotating Machines in Industry 4.0 using Generative AI
InitialFeedbackHistory:
13/03/2025
Dear Tauheed,

As discussed during our meeting earlier this week, some small suggestions for your DMP. We do not recommend the use of Onedrive. On this page you can find more information on storage solutions recommended by ICTS of KU Leuven: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
 
When restricting research data, please indicate clearly why the data will be restricted (and for what timeframe). Try to indicate this consistently throughout your DMP.

You can find more information about RDM on this webpage: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en

Please don't hesitate to contact us with further questions via: onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be

Kind regards,

Maarten
label: good with suggestions
